title: Investigate Yield Loss in Manufacturing
description: A manufacturing engineer needs to investigate why the yield of a recent batch was significantly lower than average.

tasks.description: Retrieve the batch record and process parameters for the low-yield batch.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls the data from the MES.

tasks.description: Compare the process parameters of the low-yield batch to those of several historical high-yield batches.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent performs a comparison and finds that the drying time for the low-yield batch was 2 hours shorter than normal.

tasks.description: Formulate a hypothesis for the root cause.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent hypothesizes that the reduced drying time led to incomplete solvent removal, causing material to be rejected.

tasks.description: Open a formal investigation to confirm the root cause and implement a corrective action.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent initiates a quality investigation to address the issue.
